short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A light color mode for Zoom video calls

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension recolors Zoom in the browser to be in a light mode. The default colors are black text on light gray backgrounds. You can also change the colors yourself to whatever you like.
